fields.description:
Building from source not all files are installed/deployed to $EUCALYPTUS.

This results in files from build clobbering installed files if building from source in the system to be deployed/tested on.

List of files:
http://hastebin.com/owulidemoq
fields.summary: $EUCALYPTUS not obeyed by all components via make install from source.

comments.body:
The list:

{code}
C /usr/lib64/axis2c
C /usr/lib64/axis2c/services
A /usr/lib64/axis2c/services/EucalyptusCC
A /usr/lib64/axis2c/services/EucalyptusCC/eucalyptus_cc.wsdl

A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/commands/bootstrap/__init__.py
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/commands/bootstrap/deregisterservice.pyc
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/commands/bootstrap/describeavailableservicetypes.pyc

A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/exceptions.py
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/exceptions.pyc
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/util.py
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin/util.pyc
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info/PKG-INFO
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info/SOURCES.txt
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info/dependency_links.txt
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info/requires.txt
A /usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin-4.2.0_dev-py2.6.egg-info/top_level.txt
{code}
The list captures the files that don't respect the $EUCALYPTUS variable. Some will eventually go away. Others may be hard to fix as specific paths are expected by dependencies (Axis).

This list is currently documented at the bottom of the INSTALL file:
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/blob/master/INSTALL
If the list changes (things are moved into $EUCALYPTUS or deleted), then update this INSTALL file to match.

As of this writing, it says:
{noformat}
The "make install" copies most of the artifacts into the $EUCALYPTUS
directory tree, and copies some into certain system directories.

If your build system is also running Eucalyptus installed from packages,
note that certain files in system directories will be overwritten by this
"make install". As of this writing, the files that "make install" copies to
system directories instead of within the $EUCALYPTUS tree are:

/usr/bin/euctl
/usr/bin/euserv-*
/usr/lib64/axis2c/services/Eucalyptus*
/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucalyptus_admin*
/usr/share/man/man1/euctl.1
/usr/share/man/man1/euserv-*

{noformat}
